CONTROLS:

WSAD - Move

LeftMouse - Shoot Primary

LeftShift - Sprint

RightMouse - Aim

LeftControl - Crouch

C - Prone

Alpha 1-4 & ScrollWheel - Switch Weapons

K - Suicide

E - Pickup Items

PLEASE READ BELOW IF YOU WANT TO KNOW HOW TO PLAY ZOMBIES

  • Once you begin there is no pause
  • to use vending machines you must have enough points to but whatever it is you want and you have to press Escape and use the cursor to click the button, the item will then drop onto the floor.
  • Pick up an new Weapon with E
  • Picking up Weapons drops the old one
  • Press E to get Ammo
  • Red Crate = Shotgun
  • Blue Crate = Sniper
  • Brown Crate = All the others
  • Kill Zombies to earn points
  • PLEASE COMMENT IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS/SUGGESTIONS/NEED HELP
